attributes.action: Provide free flights to all international students in the UK due to Coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details: Coronavirus (COVID-19) is spreading widely around the UK and as international students are away from their home countries and families, their are more chances that their mental health and emotional stability might be at risk and there may be chances of them falling homesick/ill which increases the risk of them having Coronavirus because of their degrading health.
attributes.background: We want the Government/Universities to help all international students in the UK by providing them free travel safely to their home countries to their families due to the high risk of Coronavirus (COVID-19)

rejection.details:
We've tried to get in touch with you to talk about your petition but we didn't hear back. 

You can get in touch with us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk if you'd like to resubmit your petition and want to talk about the contents first.
